mapper.select: SELECT r.order, s.spot_id as spotId, s.name, s.type1 as category, s.type2 as type, s.x, s.y, s.open_time as openTime, s.img FROM Daily d JOIN Review r ON d.daily_id = r.daily_id JOIN Spot s ON r.spot_id = s.spot_id WHERE d.plan_id = #{planId} and d.day_num = #{day};
select Max(day_num) From Daily d JOIN Review r ON d.daily_id = r.daily_id WHERE d.plan_id = #{planId};
